_header: Sometime a king lived in this land
Note: For the usual texts see 601 and 644; cf. also 2655.
_description: The Melancholy King, a Narratio in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Sum tyme a king lifed in þis landþat in his mind was ay murand…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And wis vs lord þe redy wayvnto þe life þat lastes ay
BLHar4196.Editions:
Rosenthal,  Constance Lowegrund. 
             The Vitae Patrum in Old and Middle English Literature.
         Philadelphia, 1936; repr. Folcroft, PA: Folcroft Library,
            1974: 156-8.
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.221-223.
